description:
.3 powder flask; .4 bullet mold; .5 patch cutter; .6 tin powder canister; .7 tin of patches; .8 oil canister; .9 ramrod; .10 pliers/ cutter; .11 powder measure; .12 wood handled tool with pointed end; .13 wood handled tool with crown-like end; .14 wood handled tool with checker board end; .15 wood handled tool with rounded end; .16 wood tool with two blunt ends; .17 wood standing bullet sizer; .18 screw down device; .19 T-shaped metal tool; .20 metal funnel; .21 small metal rod; .22 cleaning adapter with frayed metal end; .23 cleaning adapter with frayed metal end; .24 screw-on zig-zag metal piece; .25 screw-on zig-zag metal piece; .26-.29 extra main spring for lock; .30-49 bullets.

title: Accessories for British, Double Percussion Sporting Rifle
